contracts.title: Submerged Arc Option on Blackpool and Fleetwood Tramway
contracts.description:
The Blackpool & Fleetwood Tramway is the only remaining first generation tramway in the United Kingdom, having remained in constant operation since it first opened in 1885.   The current network extends for 18.2Km along the Fylde coastline from Starr Gate terminus at the southern end of the alignment to Fleetwood Ferry in the north.  

Blackpool & Fleetwood Tramway is owned by Blackpool Council (BC) and operated under licence by Blackpool Transport Services (BTS).

contracts.description: The appointment of a suitable company is required in order to undertake a full statutory audit including report and opinion to the Directors of Blackpool Transport Services Limited as to whether the financial statements represent a true and fair view of each of the company's affairs, production of Statutory Accounts and filing of the same at Companies House.

contracts.title: Request for Quotation for the Provision of Staff Uniforms
contracts.description: Blackpool Council is looking to award a contract for the supply and delivery of Staff Uniforms. This incorporates Customer First staff and staff from other departments within the Council providing a front line service.  There are approximately 230 staff across the Council currently wearing uniforms.   It is anticipated that replacement uniforms will be provided every 18 months for Customer First and between 12 and 24 months for remaining departments.
contracts.cpv_description: Occupational clothing, special workwear and accessories

contracts.description: Blackpool Coastal Housing (BCH) and Blackpool Council (BC) wish to enter into a contract with an organisation that has the capability and experience in providing a property removals service to customers.

contracts.title: Removal of Dead Bodies on Behalf of HM Coroner Blackpool & Fylde District
contracts.description:
Blackpool Council is seeking contractors to tender for the contract for the Removal of Bodies on behalf of the HM Coroner within the Blackpool & Fylde District. 
The Local Authority has the responsibility to provide appropriate, timely and robust arrangements for the collection of a deceased when the death has been referred to the HM Coroner for investigation. The deceased will be transferred to Blackpool Victoria Hospital, Whinney Heys Road, Blackpool FY3 8NR.

contracts.cpv_description: Cadaver transport and storage equipment and supplies and Funeral and related services

contracts.title: Request for Quotation for Swimming Pool Water Testing
contracts.description:
Blackpool Council currently have their swimming pools tested monthly; these water samples are collected monthly, by the supplier, and are taken back to the labs to test for any bacterial contamination in the pools and fall in line with Blackpool Council’s Health & Safety guidelines.

Blackpool Council requires the following:

•	Collection on a set day each month i.e. the first Tuesday of the month, this is so the samples ready for collection

contracts.title: Princess Street Bridge Replacement
contracts.description: Blackpool Council have run a mini competition from Bolton Council's framework, reference 2014/S 196-345888, for repair, maintenance and associated services related to roads and other equipment in order to undertake works at Princess Street bridge.

contracts.title: Provision of a Service Concession for the Collection of WEEE ICT from Blackpool Council
contracts.description: This Contract seeks to appoint a Contractor for the collection (from Blackpool Council sites) and recycling of a variety of redundant IT hardware across all software platforms in line with the requirements of the WEEE Directive and industry best practice.
